1.name: Meat Chopper
1.description: 3L Stainless Steel Electric Meat Chopper With Bi-Level Blades, 2 Speed Levels, 300W Multi Food Chopper For Meat, Vegetables, Fruits And Nuts
features: Made of food grade stainless steel, strong and durable. Easy to clean.
3L large capacity, can meet the different needs of families.
Double-layer blades can effectively flip the ingredients and cut at multiple angles.
2 gear adjustment, freely adjust according to the softness and hardness of the food.
The low-noise design does not affect anyone's work and rest.

2.name: Portable Juicer
2.description: Hands-Free USB Charging Powerful Electric Juicer Cordless Fruit Juicer, 1 Button Easy Press Lemon Lime Orange Grapefruit Juice Squeezer for Kitchen Outdoor travel
features: Anti-drip System: The juicer has a drip-proof design, the juice can be completely poured into the placed glass, you don't have to worry about the juice being wasted.
Easy to Clean: Comes with a cleaning brush that can be rinsed with water for convenience and is also dishwasher safe.
Auto-sensing: Automatic sensing peel thickness, maximum extraction of juice, to provide you with fresh and delicious juice every day.

3.name: Vacuum Sealer
3.description: Automatic Food Sealer for Dry/Moist Food, Vacuum Sealing with 10 Vacuum Sealer Bags for Kitchen
features: Easy and convenient to operate in the kitchen.
It is a perfect way to preserve meat, seafood, fresh fruits and vegetables, and dried snacks.
Strong suction, moisture and dust proof.
Fashionable appearance design, quiet low noise.
Mini size and light weight make it easy to carry and space-saving.

4.name: Vegetable Chopper
4.description: Garlic, Chili, Onion, Vegetables, Ginger Onions, Meat, Chopper Chopper Blender
features: Automatically cut vegetables, Get fast and efficient results.
With it, you can have an electric vegetable slicer and an electric meat grinder at the same time, a multifunctional package.
